content: my husband wanted a new knit hat and saw one out in town he liked i of course could not let him purchase one i came up with this one inspired by the one he liked it is a great base pattern that can be easily adjusted for other sizes and can be embellished with pom poms if you wish it also features a nice long brim to ensure your ears are covered materials for my sample i used madelinetosh pashmina in thunderstorm size us 1 5 2 5mm needle s one circular two straights or double pointed finished measurements 11 with brim flat 8 1/4 with brim cuffed women s small/medium men s small ~notes in pattern to adjust for other sizes -check out my website www katiedegroffknits com 1 - sign up for my newsletter 2 -follow and tag me in your projects on instagram @sheltipap #smallblessingshat -like and share my page on facebook katie degroff knits 3 -shop my patterns on etsy katiedegroffknits 4 1 https //katiedegroffknits com/ 2 http //eepurl com/ip1-fe 3 https //www facebook com/katiedegroffknits/ 4 https //www etsy com/shop/katiedegroffknits
